languages.text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an opening (excluding {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g}), they deal an additional +(10% of target's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}) {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
languages.original_text: Попадая в слабое место (не считая {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}сквозных пробитий{/g}), {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}ассасин{/g} наносит +10% от {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g} цели {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} дополнительно.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the Assassin {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}hits{/g} an opening (excluding {g|Encyclopedia:Overpenetration}overpenetration{/g}), they deal an additional +<u>(10% of target's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}.

Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an opening (excluding {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g}), they deal an additional +(10% of target's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}) {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

languages.text: Попадая в слабое место (не считая {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}сквозных пробитий{/g}), {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}ассасин{/g} наносит +10% от {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g} цели {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} дополнительно.

Wann immer der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassine{/g} eine Blöße {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g} (ausschließlich {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}Überdurchdringung{/g}), fügt er zusätzlich +(10 % der {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} des Ziels) {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zu.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an opening (excluding {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g}), they deal an additional +(10% of target's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}) {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Wann immer der Assassine eine Öffnung {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}trifft{/g} (ausschließlich {g|Encyclopedia:Overpenetration}Überdurchdringung{/g}), fügt er zusätzlich +<u>(10 % der {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} des Ziels)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}Schaden{/g} zu.

languages.text: Chaque fois que {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}l'Assassin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} une brèche (sauf {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}surpénétration{/g}), il inflige +(10 % de la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g} de la cible) points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an opening (excluding {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g}), they deal an additional +(10% of target's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}) {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que l'Assassin {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}touche{/g} une brèche (sauf {g|Encyclopedia:Overpenetration}surpénétration{/g}), il inflige +<u>(10 % de la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g} de la cible)</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}dégâts{/g}.

languages.text: 破绽：每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}刺客{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}破绽时（不包括{g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}过度穿透{/g}造成的攻击），都会对目标造成等同于{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}10%的额外{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an opening (excluding {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g}), they deal an additional +(10% of target's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}) {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 破绽：每当刺客{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}破绽时（不包括{g|Encyclopedia:Overpenetration}过度穿透{/g}造成的攻击），都会对目标造成等同于<u>{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}10%</u>的额外{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}伤害{/g}。

languages.original_text: Whenever the Assassin hits an opening (excluding {g|Encyclopedia:Overpenetration}overpenetration{/g}), they deal an additional +<u>10% of target's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}max wounds{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}.

languages.text: Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}asesino{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}golpee{/g} en una zona desprotegida (sin contar la {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}sobrepenetración{/g}), inflige un +(10 % de las {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g} del objetivo) como {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an opening (excluding {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g}), they deal an additional +(10% of target's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}) {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el asesino {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}golpee{/g} en una zona desprotegida (sin contar la {g|Encyclopedia:Overpenetration}sobrepenetración{/g}), inflige un +<u>(10 % de las {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g} del objetivo)</u> como {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}daño{/g} adicional.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}アサシン{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}隙{/g}に命中するたびに（{g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}過貫通{/g}を除く）、さらに+（ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大体力{/g}の10%）の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an opening (excluding {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g}), they deal an additional +(10% of target's {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g}) {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: アサシンが隙に攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}させると（{g|Encyclopedia:Overpenetration}過貫通{/g}を除く）、<u>（ターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大体力{/g}の10％）</u>の追加{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}ダメージ{/g}を与える。
